com.mousebird.maply

Class RemoteTileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mousebird.maply.RemoteTileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource

    public class RemoteTileSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource
    The remote tile source fetches individual tiles from a remote image basemap on request. It needs basic information about the remote tile source to do this, such as base URL, file extension and min and max zoom level. This object works on conjunction with a QuadImageTileLayer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  RemoteTileSource.TileSourceDelegate
      The tile source delegate will be called back when a tile loads or fails to load.

    • Method Detail

      • setCacheDir

        public void setCacheDir(java.io.File inCacheDir)
        Set the cache directory for fetched images. We'll look there first. There is no limiting or pruning going on, that directory will just get bigger and bigger.

        By default that directory is null.

        Parameters:
        inCacheDir - Cache directory for image tiles.

      • startFetchForTile

        public void startFetchForTile(QuadImageTileLayerInterface layer,
                     MaplyTileID tileID,
                     int frame)
        This is called by the quad image tile layer. Don't call this yourself.
        Specified by:
        startFetchForTile in interface QuadImageTileLayer.TileSource
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer asking for the fetch.
        tileID - The tile ID to fetch.
        frame - If the source support multiple frames, this is the frame. Otherwise -1.
